00013 namespace SassTypes
00014 {
00015   SassTypes::Value* Factory::create(Sass_Value* v) {
00016     switch (sass_value_get_tag(v)) {
00017     case SASS_NUMBER:
00018       return new Number(v);
00019 
00020     case SASS_STRING:
00021       return new String(v);
00022 
00023     case SASS_COLOR:
00024       return new Color(v);
00025 
00026     case SASS_BOOLEAN:
00027       return &Boolean::get_singleton(sass_boolean_get_value(v));
00028 
00029     case SASS_LIST:
00030       return new List(v);
00031 
00032     case SASS_MAP:
00033       return new Map(v);
00034 
00035     case SASS_NULL:
00036       return &Null::get_singleton();
00037 
00038     case SASS_ERROR:
00039       return new Error(v);
00040 
00041     default:
00042       const char *msg = "Unknown type encountered.";
00043       Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New<v8::String>(msg).ToLocalChecked());
00044       return new Error(sass_make_error(msg));
00045     }
00046   }
00047 
00048   NAN_MODULE_INIT(Factory::initExports) {
00049     Nan::HandleScope scope;
00050     v8::Local<v8::Object> types = Nan::New<v8::Object>();
00051 
00052     Nan::Set(types, Nan::New("Number").ToLocalChecked(), Number::get_constructor());
00053     Nan::Set(types, Nan::New("String").ToLocalChecked(), String::get_constructor());
00054     Nan::Set(types, Nan::New("Color").ToLocalChecked(), Color::get_constructor());
00055     Nan::Set(types, Nan::New("Boolean").ToLocalChecked(), Boolean::get_constructor());
00056     Nan::Set(types, Nan::New("List").ToLocalChecked(), List::get_constructor());
00057     Nan::Set(types, Nan::New("Map").ToLocalChecked(), Map::get_constructor());
00058     Nan::Set(types, Nan::New("Null").ToLocalChecked(), Null::get_constructor());
00059     Nan::Set(types, Nan::New("Error").ToLocalChecked(), Error::get_constructor());
00060     Nan::Set(target, Nan::New<v8::String>("types").ToLocalChecked(), types);
00061   }
00062 
00063   Value* Factory::unwrap(v8::Local<v8::Value> obj) {
00064     // Todo: non-SassValue objects could easily fall under that condition, need to be more specific.
00065     if (!obj->IsObject() || obj.As<v8::Object>()->InternalFieldCount() != 1) {
00066       return NULL;
00067     }
00068 
00069     return static_cast<Value*>(Nan::GetInternalFieldPointer(obj.As<v8::Object>(), 0));
00070   }
00071 }
